name: Cooking Garage
description:
Cooking Garage is a local single-player game where you have to prepare an order with special tools.

This game has been made in less than a month, during a game jam on the theme "It's not supposed to do that" by two students from E-artsup Paris in third year.

Controls :
  • Z/Q/S/D to move
  • Left click to pick up
  • Right click to drop
Team : Programmer :
  • Alban Lozac'h
Graphist :
  • Yoann Messant
Install instructions :
  1. Download the .RAR file.
  2. Drag it in any folder you want.
  3. Right Click and click on "Extract Here".
  4. Open the folder called "BUILD GameJam11.10"
  5. Double click on "GameJam11.10.exe"
  6. Congratulations you are ready to play !
